PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Predicting Interview Appearance
Python, Machine Learning, Data Analysis · The project was all about predicting whether a candidate appears for an interview or not based on certain features. The model can be used by a recruiting agency that does the job of sending required number of candidates for interview to certain companies. Based on the prediction the recruiting agency can accommodate more or less number of candidates depending on the required number of candidates for a company.

This app is made using Node.js and Express.js in the backend and HTML, CSS and Javascript in the frontend. This app enables group chat among different users through a common Room Name. There are two webpages in this app, the first one is the Join app page where users provide their Display names and a common Room name. The second page is where the chatting takes place. The server side code rests in the Server directory. The client side work is in the Public directory.
